verbose_text: The resulting truncated protein would be devoid of very important functional domains, including the SEM1 binding site, DNA binding site, nuclear localization signal (NLS), and the CDK phosphorylation site at S3291, which also binds RAD51.2, 13 SEM1 stabilizes BRCA2 by preventing its degradation.
evidence: CDK phosphorylation site at S3291, which also binds RAD51.2
